title:
Kernel-induced distance and its applications to Composition operators on
  Large Bergman spaces
abstract:
In this paper, we obtain a complete characterization for the compact
difference of two composition operators acting on Bergman spaces with a rapidly
decreasing weight $\omega=e^{-\eta}$, $\Delta\eta>0$. In addition, we provide
simple inducing maps which support our main result. We also study the
topological path connected component of the space of all bounded composition
operators on $A^2(\omega)$ endowed with the Hilbert-Schmidt norm topology.
